statements: UPDATE customer_service_interactions SET satisfaction_score = 5 WHERE interaction_id = 123;

UPDATE AgentPerformance SET satisfaction_rating = 5, average_duration = '00:45:00', total_interactions = 10 WHERE agent_id = 3;

UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET interaction_date = '2022-06-15', interaction_time = '15:30:00', interaction_duration = '01:30:00', call_details = 'Resolved issue with product XYZ' WHERE interaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE AgentPerformance SET total_interactions = 100, total_duration = '20:00:00', average_duration = '00:12:00', satisfaction_rating = 4 WHERE agent_id = 56789;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_duration = 120 WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE agents SET agent_experience = 5, agent_team = 'Sales' WHERE agent_id = 3;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_duration = 30 WHERE interaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE agents SET agent_role = 'Senior Agent', agent_experience = 5 WHERE agent_id = 101;

UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET interaction_duration = 30, interaction_type = 'Complaint' WHERE interaction_id = 100;
UPDATE AgentPerformance SET performance_score = 8.7, interactions_completed = interactions_completed + 1, training_completed = TRUE WHERE agent_id = 201;
UPDATE customer_records SET customer_name = 'John Doe', address = '123 Main St' WHERE customer_id = 1;
